question: <image 1> What is the substance that is developing on these leaves?
options: ['Algae', 'Downy mildew', 'Powdery mildew', 'Sooty mould', "Don't know and don't want to guess"]
description: The image shows a close-up view of several green leaves with a noticeable yellowish-green substance covering them. The leaves appear to be part of a plant with purple flowers in the background. The substance on the leaves is unevenly distributed, with some areas more heavily covered than others. The texture of the substance looks powdery or dusty, suggesting it might be a type of fungal growth or mold.
